title: The Capital of Crits
goal: Artie must hide in plain sight while trying to find a way to stabilize his build.
stakes_shift: The stakes move from physical survival to social navigation and avoiding the 'System Police'.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is a fugitive from Vane's ego.
bridge.to_next: Artie enters the Grand Arena for a 'Low-Stakes' tournament.

sections.title: The City of Gold and Glitches
sections.intent: Establish the capital city as a place where 'Crits' are worshiped.

scenes.summary: Artie enters the city and sees the 'Temple of the D20,' where priests pray for high rolls.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he is basically a walking god in this religion.

scenes.summary: Artie tries to find a 'Stat-Wiper' to fix his 1 HP, but finds out it's a crime punishable by 'Deletion'.
scenes.outcome: Artie is stuck with his glass cannon build forever.

sections.title: The Underground Market
sections.intent: Artie looks for illegal mods to help him survive.

scenes.summary: Fizz leads Artie to a black market run by a group of 'Dev-Haters' who sell items that bypass System rules.
scenes.outcome: Artie gains access to a 'Lag-Switch' potion.

scenes.summary: Artie meets an informant who tells him that Vane is the son of the High Priest of RNG.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry with Vane just became a religious war.

scenes.summary: The black market is raided by the 'System Sentinels,' and Artie has to use his first 'Lag-Switch' to escape.
scenes.outcome: Artie escapes, but the potion has a side effect: he speaks in binary for an hour.

sections.title: The Arena Invitation
sections.intent: Set up the climax of the book.

scenes.summary: Artie sees a flyer for the 'Grand Crit-Off,' where the prize is a 'Shield of Infinite Health'.
scenes.outcome: Artie decides to enter, despite the risk of exposure.

scenes.summary: Artie registers under the name 'Crit-iculous' and accidentally sets his entry fee to 'All My Gold'.
scenes.outcome: Artie is now broke and must win the tournament to survive.

scenes.summary: Vane sees the name on the roster and smiles, knowing he can finally 'delete' Artie in front of a crowd.
scenes.outcome: The stage is set for the final confrontation.
